titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab:
1803; Jan. 1. Sa. Chaucer, revise. Dine at Philips , w. Wolcot, Aikin, Ht, Steven, Bradley, Busby, Skinner & Owen; adv. Reid
.
Jan. 2. Su. Chaucer, 2 pages. Dine at H G's , w. M J, F, M, J & C : Keir calls n .

3. M. Speght, &c. Jas Wt dines: call, w. M, on West, at Jo G's
.

4. Tu. // Chaucer, revise. Miss Thomas calls: call on
Townsend
, &
White bookseller
.

5. W. Notes for Chaucer. Write to Townsend . Call on S E
: theatre, 3/10 Belle's Stratagem.

6. Th. Chaucer, 1 page. Guesclin. Dine at Northmores , w. W Burdon :
M's , w. M J, F, M, C, J, Jas Wt, Lambs & Fell .
7. F. Guesclin, &c. Combe calls: theatre, Family Quarrels, act 3.

8. Sa. Notes for Chaucer. Write to C Smith : M dines: call on
Townsend
.

Jan. 9. Su. Chaucer, p. // 219. Smith & mrs Napier call: call on
Wake
n , &
mrs Perry , w. M J : dine at Ht's , w. Bannister, M J & F .

10. M. Chaucer, p. 221. Call on Ht
n; adv. Charlotte
.
11. Tu. Chaucer, p. 223. Museum, F St Francis : E Napier calls: dine at Nicholson's , w. M J : Austin calls n .

12. W. Chaucer, p. 226/2. Call on Northcote
&
Underwood
n .

13. Th. Call on Townsend
,
Philips
,
Davison
&
Perry ; adv. Goold
: Record Office, w. Townsend . Write to Astle .

14. F. Chaucer, p. 227. M dines: call on
Underwood
n .

15. Sa. Chaucer, p. 233. Jas Wt dines:
Underwood calls.

Jan. 16. Su. Chaucer, p. 235. Tower, Patent Rolls : call on Lamb
: Carlisle & Buchan call n : sup at Fell's , w. M J.

17. M. Barnes, çala. Museum, Cotton; adv. Planta & Damiani
: call on Ht
&
Condé
.

18. Tu. Barnes, çala. Tower; adv. Vandersee
: call call on Townsend
&
Lamb
: sup at Carlisle's , w. M J .

19. W. Chaucer, p. 236. Call on Philips
: meet Malthus : Lambs sup.
20. Th. Gower, çala. Davis, Welch Unitarian, calls: dine at Carlisle's , w. Nicholsons, Patterson, Ayrton & M J .
21. F. Museum, Mss : dine at Nicholson's , w. 2 Hts, 3 Smiths, Wolcot, Foulkes, Hayward, mrs Kelly, miss Haines, miss Sherwood & M J .
22. Sa. Chaucer, çala. Theatre, 1/10 Stratagem.

Jan. 23. Su.
Tower, w. Townsend : call on Lamb ; adv. Rickman
: Jo G calls n : 5 Smiths, 4 Nicholsons, 2 Hts, Hill, Foulkes & R Taylor dine

24. M.
Museum : call on Philips ; adv. Hurst & Britton
: call on Vandersee , Exchequer Office : Theatre, 1/10 Othello , &
Richard, act 5; adv. Wake
25. Tu. Chaucer, 3 pages. Jas Pratt calls: M dines.
26. W. Chaucer, revise. Museum, Caxton, &c : theatre, 1/10 Merry Wives, & Harlequin's Habeas.
27. Th. Tower.
28. F. Wicliffe, çala. Museum, Anstis, &c. Joyces call.

29. Su.
Chaucer, p. 238. M dines:
theatre, w. M J & M; Hear Both Sides; adv. Opies & Nicholsons
.
Jan. 30. Su. Chaucer, p. 241. Wolcot calls.

31. M. Chaucer. p. 244/2. Museum; Rymer's MSS : call on L Ht
.

Feb. 1. Tu. Chaucer, p. 248/2. Museum, Rymer's Ms; adv. Shaw & Wilson
: theatre, 1/2 Hear Both Sides; adv. Este
.

2. W. Chaucer, p. 249/2. Jas Wt dines; adv. M Lamb
: theatre, 1/5 Hamlet: M sups. Austin calls.

3. Th. Chaucer, p. 251. M ( Hamilton's fire) &
Ja Wt call: Museum; adv. Wilson
: call on Ogbourne
.

4. F. Chaucer, p. 255/2. Museum: theatre, 1/15 Hear Both Sides; &
Man of the World, act 5.

5. Sa. Chaucer, revise. Call, w. M J, on Buchan
n .
Feb. 6. Su. Chaucer, revise. M dines.
7. M. Chaucer, 1/2 page; revise. Museum: H G & miss Forsyth at tea. Trial of Despard .
8. Tu. Chaucer, revise. Museum, Mongitore & Vossius : Joyces at tea.

9. W. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages; revise. Call on
Nicholson
.
10. Th. Chaucer, revise. Museum, Avesbury & Hector Boethius .
11. F. Museum, Villani & Duchesne . Miss Forsyth dines.
12. Sa. Chaucer, revise; Regnier. M dines. Write to Philips .

Feb. 13. Su. Chaucer, revise. Ht & Lamb call: call on
Reynolds
n .

14. M. Chaucer, revise. Museum, Fabian . Cooper breakfasts & dines:
theatre, w. him, Hamlet, acts 2 & 3 .

15. Tu.
Tower, duchess Blanche : Herald's College, Townsend & Dallaway
: call on Lamb ; adv. White
: Cooper & M dine.
16. W. Chaucer, revise. Museum.

17. Th. Chaucer, revise. Museum, Bavaria; adv. Ritson
: meet Bazeley & Malthus ; M & Cooper dine:
theatre, w. them & children, Family Quarrels & Tale of Mystery : Smith calls n . & Callender .

18. F. Chaucer, revise. Dine at Lea, Castle & Falcon, w. M, Cooper & Jo G; adv. Simpson & Box
. Condé calls n .

19. Sa. Chaucer, revise. Jas Wt dines:
theatre, Hero of the North. call on Lamb
, &
White
n .

Feb. 20. Su.
Tower : call on Hill
, &
Vandersee
n : Smart dines: Condé calls n .
E P Cooper dies .

21. M. Chaucer, 1 page. Northmore calls: call on Northcote ; adv. Northmore & Jenner
: dine at Ht's
: Ogbourne calls.
Execution of Despard & six
.
22. Tu. Chaucer, 2 pages. Condé calls: Museum, Aventinus .
23. W. Chaucer, 1 page; revise. Dine at Northmore's , w. major Cartwright, Opie, Bamfylde & Keenan .

24. Th. Chaucer, 1 page; revise.
E P Cooper's funeral, w. 2 Kingstons, M & Wilcocke junr
: M & Cooper dine. Write to Ellis, Museum .

25. F. Chaucer, 1 page; revise. Meet Jas White : call on Ritson
: Keir at tea; adv. Lambs
: Callendar calls.

26. Sa. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages; revise. Wake & Nicholsons call: call on Condé
: Smith sups.
Feb. 27. Su. Dine at H Tooke's , w. Bosville, 2 Knights, 2 Scotts, Macdonald, Gawler, James, capt. Wilson & Hague : return, w. Wilson & Hague . Ht calls n .
28. M. Chaucer, revise. Write to Harwood

Mar. 1. Tu. Chaucer, 1 page; revise. Hazlit calls: call on Nicholson
, &
Ht
n . Write to Tarleton . meet Joyces, St Pancras .
2. W. Chaucer, revise. Meet Plowden & Jas Moore : dine at Lady Valentia's , w. Gawler, Burdet & Eardley .

3. Th. Chaucer, revise. Meet Jas White : call on Tarleton
,
Hoare
&
Ald. Combe
n : Jas Wt dines: M sups.

4. F. Call on Pells Office
,
Perry
, (
Gascoyne
n),
Harwood
,
Davison
n,
Cooper
n, Museum (my letter discussed) &
Nicholson
: dine at Wake's
: Oratorio, 2/2 act. Write to Roberts . Cooper calls n .

5. Sa. Write to Robinsons : Call on Gascoyne
, &
Northcote , w. W L White, adv. Hazlit
: W L White & mrs Napier dine: Combe calls.

Mar. 6. Su.
Smart , Combe & J J G call: Cooper, M & Ht dine.

7. M.
Condé , Ogbourne & Hazlit call: call on Condé
:
theatre, Hamlet, w. M J; adv. W L White, Ht & Dyne
.

8. Tu.
Tobin & Combe na call: theatre, John Bull. War Message.
9. W. Chaucer, transcribe, 8 pages. M & Cooper dine
10. Th. Chaucer, trs, 6 pages. W L White & E Napier dine.

11. F. Chaucer, 8 pages, trs. L Ht calls: call on
Northcote
: Smith sups.

12. Sa. Chaucer, revise App. Call on Porson
: Ogbourne calls (plate): M dines: theatre, Hamlet, acts 1, 2, 3; adv. Fell
.

Mar. 13. Su. Call on Porson (Patents) &
Lamb
: Cooper breakfasts: Smart & Condé call n : Ht at tea.

14. M. Chaucer, revise. L Ht & sons dine; adv. Ht
: Hazlit & Condé call: call on
Smart
.

15. Tu. Chaucer, revise. Call on Davison
&
Lamb
: dine at Plowden's
. Call on Jo G
n .

16. W. Chaucer, p. 257/2. Museum, Statutes, &c; adv. Stoddart
: dine at Johnson's , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Hollis & Storch . Jo G calls.
17. Th. Chaucer, p. 260. Museum, Petrarca . Wolcot calls n : theatre, Macbeth.
18. F. Chaucer, p. 262. Coleridge & Tobin call: theatre, 1/6 Oratorio.

19. Sa. Chaucer, p. 263. Call on Philips
&
Townsend
: Cooper & M dine.

Mar. 20. Su. Chaucer, p. 265/2. Write to Fox . Hollis , Smart & Wake call: dine at
Tobin's , w. Coleridge, capt. Tobin & Ht : meet Younger .

21. M. Chaucer, p. 266/2. Condé , Philips & Hazlit call: call on Dakins
&
Ellis, W Abbey
: meet T C Rickmn:
theatre, Richard; adv. Taylors, Morton, Pearson, Ht & M
.

22. Tu. Chaucer, p. 267. Coleridge, Hazlit, Ht & Lambs & Jas Wt. dine; adv. L Ht
: Cooper sups. invité Davy
.

23. W. Chaucer, revise. Combe na & M Lamb call: E Napier & Ct Poole dine. Call on Davison
n .
24. Th. House of Fame: Pope, do . Write to Wake & Goodbehere .

25. F. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages.
Smart (10 guineas)
Austin & Lambs call: Cooper dines.
26. Sa. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. L Ht & sons dine.
Mar. 27. Su. Chaucer, p. 7/2. Carlisle & A Nicholson call; & S Fell : M Lamb & Combe at tea: sit up, w. Combe .

28. M. Birth of William, 10 minutes before 11, am. Call on
Lamb ; adv. Coleridge
: Museum : M dines: call, w. M, on L Ht
&
Nicholson
: Condé calls.

30. W. Chaucer, p. 9/2. Call on Townshend
: Nicholsons call: meet Fells : call on Lamb
n; adv. Coleridge
.

31. Th. Chaucer, p. 9. Call on Hoare
n &
Mrs Wake
: Cooper , Carlisles , Hts , Fell & Lamb call: call on
Fell ; adv. Lamb
. Write to Philips & to Dalling .
Apr. 1. F. Chaucer, p. 13. S Fell calls: Coleridge au soir.

2. Sa. Chaucer, p. 14, & 268. Jas Wt dines:
Cooper & Wilcocke call, & Smart .

Apr. 3. Su. Chaucer, 2 pages. Wake calls: dine at
Philips's , w. Hts & Surrs : H G & miss Waring dine; adv. Jo G n
. L Knapp & mrs Toke call.

4. M. Chaucer, 1 page. Call on Dallaway
&
Carlisle
n .

5. Tu. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. Call on Jas Wt
Ht
: meet Jas Wt : Cooper, Wilcocke & M (& Toke) dine; adv. Coleridge, Lamb & Smith
: sup at Lamb's , w. them & Allen .
6. W. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. L & F Ht call: E Napier dines: adv. John Napier .

7. Th. Chaucer, 4 1/2 pages. Call on C Moore
n : M sups.
8. F. Chaucer, 3 pages. Lamb & Fell call: Jas Wt dines.
9. Sa. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. Hill , Cooper & M call.
Apr. 10. Su. Chaucer, 1 page. Carlisle , Wakes , A & M Nicholson , & Smart call: Jas Wt dines.

11. M. Chaucer, revise. Call on Northcote
: meet Austin : A Harwood dines. L Ht calls n .

12. Tu. Chaucer, revise. Call on Lamb
n : M dines: theatre, John Bull, acts 3 & 4.

13. W. Chaucer, 3 pages. Call on Gen. Maitland
: Wood calls: M at tea.

14. Th. Chaucer, 3 pages. Call on Townsend
&
Mcquin
: L Ht & sons, & J G dine; adv. Nicholsons
.
15. F. Chaucer, 4 pages.

16. Sa. Chaucer, revise. Call on Johnson
: meet Tooke & Joyce : call on Davison
n .

Apr. 17. Su. Chaucer, revise. Smart , F Ht & S Nicholson call: Cooper & M dine; adv. S Fell & Ht
.
18. M. Chaucer, revise. Museum .
19. Tu. Chaucer, revise. Write to Lauderdale . Museum .

20. W. Rymer, çala. Museum; adv. Ritson
.

21. Th. Hume, Henry, &c. M dines: call on
J Bannister
n .
22. F. Chaucer, 3 pages. Dine at Ht's , w. Cooper .
23. Sa. Chaucer, 1 page. Theatre, 4/5 Marriage Promise.
Apr. 24. Su. Chaucer, 1 page. Smith calls.

25. M. Call on Philips ; adv. Skinner & Davison
: Cooper & M dine:
Ventriloquist, Fitzjames , w. Smith; adv. E Christie
. meet Dr Rees .

26. Tu. Chaucer, 1 page. Chelsea, w. Cooper : Fell at tea: sup at
M's , w. Cooper & Lamb .
27. W. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. St Paul's, w. M J, F, M, C & J : Cooper, Smith & M dine. meet W Tooke. (from Wilson .)
28. Th. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. Callendar calls: M dines: sup at Fell's , w. Cooper & Lamb .
29. F. Burke, Pol. Justice, Wrongs of Woman, &c. Theatre, Fortune's Frolic.

30. Sa. Collins, Rymer, &c.
Austin & W C Brown call: Hill, Cooper & M à la campagne .
May 1. Su. Chaucer, 4 pages. Smart calls: Lucas dines: meet Wake .

2. M. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. Exhibition; adv. Morton, Boaden, J Taylor, A Opie, Batty, Britton & 4 Smiths
: sup at J Hollis's
.
3. Tu. Chaucer, 5 pages. Museum; Cotton, &c.
4. W. Chaucer, revise. Museum; Walsingham . Dine at Johnson's , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Barlow, W C Brown, Stephens, Mahon & Newnum.
5. Th. Froissart & M U History. Lambs call: Jas Wt dines; adv. Cooper (from Richardson ).

6. F. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. Museum; adv. Ritson
. Cooper dines: sup, w. him, at Fell's
.
7. Sa. Rymer, &c. Dawe at tea.

May 8. Su. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. Wood & Smart call: dine at
Hts , w. M J & Cooper; adv. C & B Mercier
: call, w. her, on
Carlisle
n &
S Nicholson
.

9. M. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. Exhibition, w. M J; adv. Batty
: call on Lamb , do ; adv. Fenwick
: meet Carlisles : M & Cooper at tea.

10. Tu. Chaucer, 1 page. Museum; Cotton : call on Northcote
: Carlisles at tea.
11. W. Chaucer, 6 pages. M dines.
12. Th. Chaucer, 5 pages. Lambs at tea.

13. F. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages; revise: Call on
Lamb
: meet H Gawler , Hill , Henley & A Harwood : call at Ht's , for M J
.

14. Sa. Chaucer, revise.
Pidcock's , w. M J, F, M, C & J
: W C Brown, Cooper, Jas Wt & M dine.
May 15. Su. Chaucer, revise. Smith & Smart call: H G, P G, F Ht & miss Harwood at tea. call on mrs Joyce , w. M J .

17. Tu. Chaucer, 1 page; revise. Museum: meet Jas Moore & femme
.
18. W. Chaucer, 3 pages. Museum, Acad. des Inscriptions . Youens calls.
19. Th. Good Women. Museum; adv. Vandersee : theatre, 1/2 Mountaineers.
20. F. Chaucer, 7 1/2 pages. Alexander the Great.

21. Sa. Chaucer, 3 1/2 pages. Call on R Taylor ; adv. pere
; &
Ritson , w. M J.

May 22. Su. Chaucer, 3 pages. Call on Wolcot
: Hts, Austin & Smart dine; adv. Wolcot
.

23. M. Call on Northcote
n &
Hoare
n : meet Rogers : sup at Cooper's , w. Cooke .
24. Tu. Write to Curran & Cha. Smith . Meet Combe : dine at T Harwood's , w. Ht's . War voted, 398 to 67.

25. W. Chaucer, revise. Museum, Walsingham . Cooper dines; adv. Fell
: theatre, Tale of Terror. Austin calls.

26. Th. Chaucer, revise. Call on Mrs I R Smith
: meet Plowden & Jer. Taylor . Jas Wt dines.
27. F. Chaucer, revise. Museum, Walsingham . Meet Kemble & Boaden .

28. Sa.
Wood , Knighton & Lewis . Call at Haverstock Hill, w.
M J , &c.

May 29. Su. Chaucer, 4 pages. Smith , Cooper & Jas Wt call: call, w. M J, on Philips
&
Lamb n .
30. M. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. Cooper dines.

31. Tu. Chaucer, 3 1/2 pages. Call, w. M J, on Northcote
,
L Ht
&
Nicholson
: theatre, Mrs Wiggins.
June 1. W. Chaucer, 3 1/2 pages. Cornel calls.

2. Th. Chaucer, 3 1/2 pages. Call on Davison
.
3. F. Chaucer, 5 pages. J G dines.

4. Sa. Chaucer, 2 pages; revise. Call on
Davison
: Cooper, Smith & Jas Wt dine: call, w. M J, on Ht n
(adv. Charlotte ) &
Carlisle
.
June 5. Su. Chaucer, revise. Smart calls.

6. M. Chaucer, revise. Meet Carlisles : Museum, Pasquier; adv. Ritson
.

7. Tu. Chaucer, revise. Call, on w. M J, on Emma Smith (adv. S Nicholson & miss King ),
Wakes n &
Lambs n :
E Napier calls: Lambs sup.
8. W. Chaucer, revise. Write to Coleridge .

9. Th. Chaucer, 2 pages. Museum, Cotton; adv. Ritson
.

10. F. Chaucer, 3 pages. Museum, Caylus; adv. Fillingham
: theatre, L Knapp & Ms dine:
theatre, w. M J, L Knapp & Fells; Othello; adv. mrs Hodges
. Masters calls n .

11. Sa. Chaucer, 2 pages.
Wet Docks & Beasts ith Tower, w. Smith & C C
; dine at Smith's
.
June 12. Su. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. Smart calls: call on Keir , w. M J .

13. M. Chaucer, 2 pages. Anderson calls: Museum . call on Fell , w. M J; adv. Arnot
.

14. Tu. Chaucer, 3 pages. Museum, Rymer; adv. Ritson & Parkinson
: Ms dine & Cooper .

15. W. Chaucer, 3 1/2 pages. Museum; adv. Ritson
. Dine at Johnson's , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Rawlinson, Henley & Hodges .
16. Th. Chaucer, 3 1/2 pages. Tea Joyce's , w. M J, Shiel, Benjers, Dr Reid, &c : Ms & L Knapp call.

17. F. Chaucer, 3 1/2 pages. Museum, Mariana; adv. Fillingham
: H G, P G & miss Forsyth at tea.

18. Sa. Chaucer, 3 1/2 pages. Arnot calls: call on Northcote ; adv. pere
.

June 19. Su. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. Meet Cooper : Smith & Alfred Nicolson dine; adv. Arnot
: Smart calls.
20. M. Chaucer, 4 pages.

21. Tu. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. Call on R Taylor
: meet Wake & Henley .

22. W. Chaucer, 4 pages. Museum, Hollinshed; adv. Fillingham
.
23. Th. Chaucer, 2 pages. Keir , & Cooper (for Ireland ) call: Write to Curran & E Bishop : call at Fell's , w. M J, F, M & J .

24. F. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. Museum, Moreri .
Theatre, w. M J, Wonder, Lee Lewes's Benefit .

25. Sa. Chaucer, 3 pages. E Napier at tea: call, w. M J, on Ht n &
Carlisle
: Philips calls n .
June 26. Su. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. Smart calls: Dewar at tea: Ht calls. Chaucer dies.

27. M. Chaucer, 1 page. Museum, Gough : call on Nichols
& Arnot
Philips ; adv. Wolcot & Pratt
: Ms dine.

28. Tu. Chaucer, 6 lines. Museum; Ellis & Ritson
. Write to Gough . Arnot & Dewar dine. Theodosius.

29. W. Chaucer, revise. Museum, Spelman & Wake; adv. Fillingham & Wilson
: call on Hill
n .
30. Th. Museum, Spelman & Hollinshed : meet Rees : C C .
July 1. F. Chaucer, revise.

2. Sa. Chaucer, revise. Call on Arnot
n : Jas Wt dines; adv. Dawe
: sup at Lamb's , w. M J & Fells .
July 3. Su. Chaucer, revise. Arnot & Smith call n : dine at Ht's , w. M J & Cs Mercier .
4. M. Chaucer, revise. Arnot at tea: Thos Turner, 11, Leigh Street, Red Lion Square, calls.

5. Tu. Chaucer, 1 page: Call on Perry ; adv. Ht (Gerrald) : Smith dines: call, w. M J, on L Knapp ; adv. Ms
.

6. W. Pierce Plowman. Greenwich, w. M J, F, M, C & J, Ms, Jas Wt & Smith ; dine at Smith's
: call on Davisonn
: H Rowan & Wolcot call n .

7. Th.
Museum, Pierce Plowman . Nicholson & Smith dine: tea, w. M J, F & Smith, at Nicholson's, Kentish Town ; adv. miss Hayward
.

8. F. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages . Call on Edwards
n : meet Gawler : vote for Holmes, postman : Museum, Throsby : Hts at tea; meet Philips's, w. Hts & M J .
9. Sa. Chaucer, 4 pages. Arnot at tea: Northcote calls n .

July 10. Su. Chaucer, 3 pages. Smart calls: Jas Wt & Smith at tea: call on
Keir , w. M J .

11. M. Chaucer, 2 pages; revise. Museum; adv. Vandersee
: C Keir dines, & M.

12. Tu. Chaucer, revise. Combe calls: Museum : call on R Taylor
: Arnot at tea: Smart calls.

13. W. Chaucer, revise. Museum : call on Carlisle
n &
Buchan
n : Lambs sup.
14. Th. Chaucer, revise. Museum : dine at L Knapp's , w. Ms, M J, F, M, C & J .

15. F. Chaucer, revise. Museum : meet Combe : P G & miss Yates at tea: Jo G calls: call, w. M J, on Nicholson
&
Carlisle
n .

16. Sa. Chaucer, revise. Call on Ellis, Chapter House, Westminster
, &
Phillips
n : mrs Reynolds dines; adv. Lamb
: Arnot & M at tea: S Fell calls.

July 17. Su.
Tower; adv. Townsend
. Jo G , Smart & Northcote
call & J Hollis call n : sup at Philips's , w. M J, Wolcot & Surrs . Deliquium .

18. M. Proofs of Plowman : Smart & Arnot & Combe call: call, w. M J, on S Nicholson
: M dines.

19. Tu.
Tower : call on R Taylor
. Jo G calls.

20. W. Chaucer, 3 1/2 pages. Philips calls: E Philips dines: call, w. M J, on Keir n &
Joyce n . Deliq .

21. Th. Chaucer, 1 page. Arnot breakfasts: Smart calls, &
Wallis, Camden Street
. Deliq. Call on Ht , w. M J.

22. F.
Deliqs
. Northcote & M sup. Joyce calls. Vomitio : Camden Street .

23. Sa.
H Rowan & Hts call: Jas Wt breakfasts; adv. M (Primrose Street) . sets out for Russia . Death of Kilwarden .

July 24. Su. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages.
Tower, w. J G
: H Rowan & Wolcot dine: Jo G // calls n .

25. M. Chaucer, 1 page. Call on Taylors
n &
Philips
n : theatre, Point of Honour, acts 2 & 3, & Love Laughs at Locksmiths; adv. Hill, Fillingham (& Dubois) : R Taylor calls n .

26. Tu. Chaucer, 2 pages. Call on Philips
n &
Jo G [n;?] adv. Harriet
: H G & miss Forsyth at tea; adv. Northcote
.

27. W. Chaucer, revise. Museum : call on Planta
n & Philips: dine at Johnson's , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Barlow, Henley & Hodges : P G dines; adv. Jo G
.
28. Th. Chaucer, revise. Museum : Ms at tea: Nicholsons call.
29. F. Chaucer, 2 pages; revise.

30. Sa. Chaucer, 4 pages. Call on Fillingham ; adv. Hill
: meet Ms .
July 31. Su. Chaucer, 5 pages. Combe calls na .
Aug. 1. M. Chaucer, 1 page. Museum : Dewar calls. meet W Webb .

2. Tu. Chaucer, revise. Museum : call on Horsefall, Chapter-office, Westminster
: Ms dine; adv. Hts
.

3. W. Chaucer, revise. Museum : Arnot calls: tea
Joyce's , w. H Tooke, Harts, miss Cline, Barbaulds, Shepherd, Shields's & M J .

4. Th. Chaucer, 4 pages. Museum : dine at Ht's , w. M J : call, w. Ht, on
Merciers, Northd Court
: meet Bosville .

5. F.
Tower; adv. Vandersee
: Youngers call: sup, w. M J, at Fell's
.
6. Sa. Chaucer, revise. Arnot & Joyces call.

Aug. 7. Su. Chaucer, 2 pages. Smart calls: Hts, & Charlotte M dine; adv. Fells
. Write to Coleridge .

8. M.
Tower, w. M J & F : call at Lamb's , do
: dine at H G's , do
: H Rowan , Younger & Arnot call n .
9. Tu. Chaucer, revise. Museum . Write to Wood .
10. W. Chaucer, 2 pages; revise. Museum : theatre, 1/2 Amanthis, & 1/2 Red Roy.
11. Th. Chaucer, 4 pages. Arnot , mrs Carlisle & Smart call. Write to Smart .

12. F. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. M & M Lamb dine:
Vauxhall, w. M J; adv. Battys & Dignum
. Chaucer dies. Parliament prorogued.

13. Sa. Chaucer, 2 pages. Call on Davison
, &
Porson
n .

Aug. 14. Su. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. Call on H Rowan
: meet J Taylor : Hts & Ms at tea. Upshaw calls n .
15. M. Chaucer, 2 pages. Col. Tatham calls: miss Forsyth & P G at tea.
16. Tu. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. End of Chap. LIV.

17. W. Chaucer, 5 pages. Call on Townsend
, & , w. M J, on Grace Py[n?]e
: meet Hill .

18. Th. Chaucer, 3 pages. Dine at Ht's , w Ms; adv. A Nicholson
.

19. F. Call on Porson
&
Smart
: M J dines at Ht's
.
20. Sa. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. Jo G calls.

Aug. 21. Su. Chaucer, 4 1/2 pages. J G dines; adv. Dewar
: meet J Taylor, w. M J : call on Ms, Kentish Town , w. M J; adv. G M Cooper
.

22. M. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. Gregory Blunt, çala. Call on Porson (Records)
: meet col. Tatham .
23. Tu. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages, The End; revise. Jo G at tea.

24. W. Chaucer, revise. Museum, Parl. History : Ms dine; adv. Nicholsons
:
theatre, w. M J & M A M, Maid of Bristol, & Love Laughs; adv. Fillinghm
.

25. Th. Chaucer, revise. Museum : call on Joyce
: Northcote sups.

26. F. Chaucer, revise. Arnot calls: Museum; adv. Dawe
.

27. Sa. Froissart, çala. Carlisle at tea: sup at
Lamb's , w. M J, C C, Fells & Burnet .
Aug. 28. Su. Chaucer, revise. Chas Mercier calls.

29. M. Chaucer, Introduction, 2 1/2 pages.
Museum : M dines; adv. P G
.
30. Tu. Chaucer, revise. W & H Laurie at tea. Rain.

31. W. Chaucer, Introduction, 1 page; revise. Museum : call on Tobin (adv. T Wedgwood ) n :
theatre, w. M J, Mountaineers, & Nicodemus; adv. Fillingham
.

Sep. 1. Th. Chaucer, revise. Museum; Hall & Speed . Call on Carlisle
n &
Nicholson
.

2. F. Chaucer, revise. Write to Philips & Ht . Arnot calls: call, w. M J, on Joyce
,
Lamb n &
Davison
n : Talbot Inn, Borough. Dewar calls n .

3. Sa. Chaucer, revise. Call, w. M J, on Dulau
&
Nicholsons
: Tobin calls.
Sep. 4. Su. Coach, w. Dulau; &c: dine at H Tooke's , w. his sister & miss Wood .

5. M.
Museum; adv. Ritson
: M A M dines; adv. L Knapp
. Write to Ht .
6. Tu. Chaucer, Preface, 4 pages. Meet Tobins : Museum, Scroop .

7. W. Chaucer, Preface, 1 page.
Museum : call on Bosville
&
Ballantine
: meet Perry & Hoare : dine at Johnson's , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Henley & Mullet .

8. Th. Chaucer, 1 1/2 pages. Museum : Anderson & Rowans at tea: call, w. M J, at Carlisle's
, & sup at Nicholson's
.

9. F. Chaucer, 1 page. Museum : G M Cooper dines: call, w. M J, on Dulau
. Write to Ht .
10. Sa. Chaucer, revise. M dines.

Sep. 11. Su. Chaucer, revise. Write to Ht . Call, w. M J, &c, on L Knapp
n .

12. M. Read Chaucer, p. 98. Call on Northcote
n .
13. Tu. Chaucer, p. 204. Joyces & Arnot call: Dewar at tea: sup at Fell's , w. M J.

14. W. Chaucer, p. 276. Call on Dulau
,
Philips
&
M Lamb
.

15. Th. Chaucer, p. 407. Museum; Granger : call on L Knapp ; adv. C & E Hills
: sup at Philip'ss, Haverstock Hill , w. M N N : Lambs sup n .

16. F. Call on Ellis, British Museum ; adv. Gray
: mrs Reynolds dines: Tower Royal; call on Hill
n .

17. Sa. Preface, revise. Call on Philips
n &
John Tobin for T Wedgwood
n : theatre, Pizarro, acts 3,4/2; adv. Lea
.
Sep. 18. Su. Chaucer, 2 1/2 pages. Read, p. 473; Vol. II, p. 95. Meet Ms & L Knapp : G M Cooper, 1/2 dines.

19. M. Preface, revise. Call on Ellis
,
B Mm. Philips
&
Taylor
: M. from Harris
. contract. adv. Smart .

20. Tu. Preface, revise. British Museum, Gough; adv. Ellis
: R Taylor sups.
21. W. Chaucer, 4 pages. G M Cooper dines.

22. Th. Chaucer, revise. Call on Ellis (Museum)
&
Northcote
.

23. F. Chaucer, 1 page: copy lost. Call on Lamb
: G M C dines; adv. H G, Forsyth & M
: M sups.

24. Sa. Tour w. M J. Breakfast at Cheshunt: call on Tice at Ware n
: dine at Puckeridge: Duckworth Heath, guides: sleep at Bourne Bridge.

Sep. 25. Su. Call on Harwood
,
Abington
n : breakfast at Bourne Bridge: dine at Newmarket: meet J & E Taylor : tea Saxham, w. a volunteer
: sleep at Bury.

26. M. Breakfast at Woolpit: dine at Norman's , w. H & F Crabb: call on Burch
: walk to Norman's manufactory : sleep. Stowmarket .

27. Tu. Call on mrs Munnings
&
mrs Grimsby
: ride to Finsborough: walk to Combes Wood.

28. W. Breakfast at Stoke: dine at Wacton, w. J & E Taylor
: sup at Alderson's , w. Opies : sleep at J Taylor's, Norwich
.

29. Th.
Jno Barnard , A Opie & W Taylor n call: call, w. mrs Taylor, on Pitchford
&
mrs Dalrymple
: dine at Alderson's , w. Opies & Hudson Gurney .

30. F. Ride to Thorpe, w. Taylor : Fransom calls: call on
Alderson
: W Taylor, Pitchford, Dalrymples & H Southey sup. adv. Barnard, junr
.

Oct. 1. Sa. Call on W Taylor
,
G Sothren
&
Alderson
: meet Rigby : canon Smith at tea; adv. miss Linnée Smith, Opies & Alderson
.

Oct. 2. Su. Call on Alderson
:
Alderson calls (£50) : ride to Dalling: N G sups: sleep.

3. M. Call on Copland
&
Woodhouse
.

4. Tu. Ride to Weybourne, w. Hull G : dine, w. do
, at Cromer : sleep at North Walsham.
5. W. Breakfast at Barnard's, Knapton : pass Aylsham: dine at Dalling: 4 Coplands & Woodhouse at tea.

6. Th. Call on Sykes
n : meet Copland & Woodhouses : mrs Raven & Phillis at tea:
7. F. Norwich, dine w. sheriffs Rigby & Clarke , w. Firth, 2 Palgraves & twenty : Opies & Alderson call.

8. Sa. Call on Alderson
: Rigby calls. Dine at Wacton; adv. Taylor
: sleep at Bottesdale.

Oct. 9. Su. Ride to Lofft's, Troston Hall : spend the day; adv. Finchs & Davenport
.

10. M.
Bury, call on C Clarkson
&
Robinson
: Lofft breakfasts; adv. C Clarkson & Robinson (see F Crabb ): dine at Sudbury : sleep at Bocking.

11. Tu. Breakfast at Waltham :
snap at B Hollis's ; adv. miss Toms
: tea at Rumford : Somers Town, M. sups.

12. W. Call, w. M J, on Franks
n ,
Cooper n ,
Philips n ,
R Taylor (adv. Livies ) &
Lamb
: meet Surr : Coopers, M & J G dine; adv. Dewar
. J G breakfasts: call on mrs Jo G , w. M J.

13. Th. Journal & Newspapers. Call, w. M J, on Rowan
&
Joyce
. meet Planta . Publication

14. F. Write to Lofft : call on Carlisle
: Ms dine; adv. Coopers
. meet Polidori .

15. Sa. Write to J B Trotter . Call on Johnson
n &
Davison
: meet T Wedgwood : Curran dines; adv. G M C
:
theatre, w. Curran, 1/2 Pizarro , & Turk's Head .
Oct. 16. Su. Call on Curran , White Horse Cellar, n : Philips & Surr at tea.

17. M.
H G & Forsyth call: Smith at tea.

18. Tu. Revise Chaucer. C & Jo G dine; adv. G M C
: call on Tegart
.
Curran expected.

19. W.
Rowan & Boaden call: meet Fuseli : call on R Taylor
n & Northcote, w. M J n .

20. Th.
Batty calls: M dines: theatre, 3/10 Pizzarro; adv. Reynolds & Lawrence
.

21. F. Lofft's Tragedy. Meet Gawler & Bosville : Curran, Tooke, Gawler, Northcote, Fuseli, Nicholson, Boaden & Batty dine; adv. Cooper ; invités Kemble, Perry, Flaxman, Wolcot, Hoare, Carlisle, M; Lawrence & Reynolds
.

22. Sa. Call on Curran ; adv. Tegart & Burroughs
; & w. Curran, on mrs H Rowan
&
mrs Reynolds
. Curran expected to dinner.

Oct. 23. Su. Roxana, 100 pp: Maid's Tragedy, acts 1 & 2. Call on Curran
n .

24. M. Maid's Tragedy, fin. Call on Davison
&
Taylor
: meet Lamb : Coopers dine.

25. Tu. Camilla, 10 lines. Call on R Taylor
n : dine at H Rowan's , w. Curran, Burroughs, miss Hamiltons & M J . Cooper calls, ppc.

26. W. Character of Ritson, 4 1/2 pages. Call on Curran
: meet Perry . Curran expected to dinner.

27. Th.
G M C at tea: theatre, 4/5 Gamester. Curran expected.

28. F. Call on Taylor
&
Philips
: sup at Lamb's . adv. Heron & Smart
.
29. Sa. Roxana, çala: Belinda, p. 82.

Oct. 30. Su.
Smith calls: Philips's, Wolcot, R & P Taylor, M & G M C dine; adv. Smith
:
mrs & E Fenwick call.

31. M. Wife for a Month, acts 1, 2, 3: Mysterious Mother, acts 1 & 2.
Theatre, w. M J, Pizarro; adv. R Palgrave
.
Nov. 1. Tu. Camilla, 6 lines. Theatre, Wife of Two Husbands.
2. W. Belinda, p. 370. Dine at Johnson's , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Chalmers, Davy & Lemaitre . Cline calls n .

3. Th. Camilla, 9 lines. Call on Porson
, &, w. M J, on Smith
.

4. F.
Tho. Turner calls: call on Philips ; adv. Hill
: Rowans & miss Hamilton & Ms dine; invités Palgrave & Porson
.

5. Sa. Belmour, Vol. I. Theatre, 2/5 Calista, & Raising the Wind; adv. Hill & Morris
.

Nov. 6. Su. Dunstan, çala. Mrs & O Fenwick, G M C, H G & Forsyth dine; adv. Fenwick & Smith
: Arnot calls.
7. M. Camilla, 10 lines. Porson calls, pour diner n : dine at H Rowan's , w. O Byrne, Delany, Forbes, Butler, miss Hamiltons & mrs Beresford .

8. Tu. Osorio, acts 1, 2, 3. Call on Towers
: miss Mellor & Smith dine:
theatre, w. Smith & M J, John Bull & Raising the Wind . Arnot calls.
9. W. Catullus, Ep. 1, 2, 3, 4: Corneille, Heraclius, acte 1: Pamela, p. 76.

10. Th. Catullus, Ep. 69: Osorio, acts 4 & 5: Pamela, p. 123. Call on Arnot
.
11. F. Dunciad, Notes.

12. Sa. Pamela, p. 236. Smith & M dine:
theatre, w. do & M J, Three per Cents; adv. Wilson, Nicholsons & Boaden
.

Nov. 13. Su. Charles II, çala: Pamela, p. 296. Call on E Reynolds
: G M C dines. Catullus, Ep. 5, 6, 7, 8.

14. M. Notes for C Burnet, çala. Meet W Tooke , Fillingham , Hill & Gawler : call on R Taylor
&
Lamb
.
15. Tu. Burnet, çala: Pamela, Vol. II, p. 128. Lamb sups.
16. W. Pamela, p. 221. M & G M C dine. Write to Ht .

17. Th. Valentinian, acts 1, 2, 3. Call on
Northcote
: theatre, Venice Preserved; adv. Fk (& Mcintosh) .
18. F. Camilla, 1/2 page. Pamela, p. 285. Miss Walsh calls: theatre, 1/10 Cymbeline.

19. Sa. Camilla, p. 3/2. Valentinian, acts 4 & 5.
Theatre, Hearts of Oak, w. M J; adv. Sherwin
.

Nov. 20. Su. Camilla, p. 4/2. Grammont, Chap. 6, 7, 8. Call on Reynolds
n .
21. M. Camilla, p. 4. Grammont, Chap. 9: Pamela, Vol. II, p. 286-359.

22. Tu. Camilla, p. 5/2. Grammont, Chap. 10, 11, fin. P G dines; adv. E Mellor
. Arnot calls. Parliament meets.

23. W. Camilla, 20 lines. Meet Tobin : E Fenwics dine; adv. M & Lamb
.

24. Th. Camilla, 20 lines. Catullus, Ep. 9, 10, 11. Ht calls: M J calls on Lane n & L Ht
: G M C at tea.
25. F. Camilla, 2 pages. Catullus, 12-15: Pamela, p. 396: Beggar Girl, p. 60. Meet Barbauld .

26. Sa. Camilla, 1 page. Catullus, 16, 17, 18: Herclius, acte 2: Bonduca, act 1.
Theatre, w. M J, Isabella .

Nov. 27. Su. Catullus, Ep. 19, 20: Lobenstein, p. 33: Walpoliana, Vol. I. Call, w. M J, on Ht
&
Nicholson
.

28. M. Camilla, 1 1/2 pages. Theatre, Macbeth, acts 2, 3, ; adv. Este, Reynolds & Boaden
. Catullus, Ep. 21-25.

29. Tu. Camilla, 1 page. Catullus, Ep. 25-30. Walpoliana, Vol. II: Lobenstein, p. 66. Call, w. M J, on Lamb n &
J G
: sup, w. do , at Fenwick's
: Lamb calls n .

30. W. Camilla, 1/2 page. Ep Catullus, Ep. 30-35. G M C dines: call on
R Taylor
: theatre, 2/5 Measure for Measure, & 1/4 Irishman in London.

Dec. 1. Th. Camilla, 1 page. Catullus, Ep. 35-39. Vavasor Griffiths, çala. Meet Jer. Taylor . M J calls on Lane , & dines at Ht's
.
2. F. Camilla, revise. Catullus, Ep. 39-43: Lobenstein, p. 154.

3. Sa. Camilla, revise. Catullus, Ep. 43-47: Clarissa, p. 37. Call on R Taylor
&
Philips
: meet Fell & mrs Rowan .

Dec. 4. Su. Dine at H Tooke's , w. Burdet, Bosville, Ward, 2 Scotts, & H Gawler junr
: Ht calls n . C Keir dines.

5. M. Camilla, 2 pages. Clarissa, p. 71. Meet miss Decamp : write to H Tooke : E F, G M C & P G dine:
theatre, w. M J & E F, 3/10 Shore & Caravan; adv. Morton & Fk
.

6. Tu. Camilla, 2 pages. Clarissa, p. 99. Carlisle & Buchan call: sup at
Lamb's
.
7. W. Camilla, 2 pages. Catullus, Ep. 47-55. Dine at Johnson's , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Dowding, Dilly, capt. Hunter & Boswell : M & E F jr dine n .

8. Th. Camilla, 3 pages. Catullus, Ep. 55-58: Clarissa, p. 135.
Keenan calls.

9. F. Camilla, 2 pages. Catullus, Ep. 58-62: Clarissa, p. 163. Call on Philips ; adv. Churchil
: G M C dines.
10. Sa. Camilla, 2 pages. Catullus, Ep. 70-74: Clarissa, p. 193.
Dec. 11. Su. Camilla, 3 pages. Catullus, Ep. 74-78: M & J G dine.

12. M. Camilla, 1 1/2 pages. Catullus, Ep. 78-85: Clarissa, p. 214. Call on Northcote
: sup at Carlisle's
.

13. Tu. Camilla, 3 pages. Catullus, Ep. 85-96: Call, w. M J, on Fks
: M & Lamb at tea:
Westminster Play, w. Lamb, Eunuchus .

14. W. Terence, Eunuchus, act 1 & 2. Call on Reynolds
,
L Ht
,
Hoare
n ,
J G
&
Lamb
n : J J G n calls: theatre, English Fleet.

15. Th. Camilla, Notes. Ter., Eu., acts 3 & 4.
Theatre, w. M J, C, J, miss Mellor & M, Shylock, & Caravan; adv. J Taylor
: E F calls: M dines.
16. F. Camilla, 1 page. Ter. Eu., act 5: Clarissa, p. 273. Dawe calls.
17. Sa. Camilla, 1 1/2 pages. Catullus, Ep. 96, 97: Clarissa, p. 312. Arnot calls.

Dec. 18. Su. Camilla, 1 1/2 pages. Catullus, Ep. 98-115: Clarissa, Vol. II, p. 23. Dine at Ht's , w. M J & M; adv. Philipses & Surrs
.
Herder dies.
19. M. Camilla, 1 page. Catullus, Ep. 115, 116, 117: Burnet, Vol. I, fin: Clarissa, p. 52. Theatre, D L, Othello, act 3.

20. Tu. Camilla, 3 pages. Burnet, Vol. II, p. 55. Call on Philips
.
21. W. Camilla, 1 page. Burnet, p. 88. M & Lambs dine.
22. Th. Camilla, 2 pages. Catullus, Ep. 1-7: Burnet, p. 137. H & P G call na .

23. F. Camilla, 1 page. Catullus, Ep. 7-11: Clarissa, p. 148. Call on Joyce
n .
24. Sa. Camilla, 1 1/2 pages. Catullus, Ep. 62: Burnet, p. 293: Clarissa, p. 186.

Dec. 25. Su. Camilla, 1 page. Clarissa, p. 238. Nicholson calls: Arnot, 3 Fenwicks & G M C dine; adv. Ht ; invités Fells
.

26. M. Camilla, 2 pages. Call on Northcote
&
Carlisle
n : meet Northmores : mrs Mellor & G M C dine: theatre, 2/5 Ranger, & Harlequin's Races; adv. J Taylor
.

27. Tu. Camilla, 1 page. Catullus, Ep. 11, 12, 13: Clarissa, p. 346.
Carlisle & Buchan call.
28. W. Camilla, 1/2 page & notes. Catullus, Ep. 14, 15, 16. Theatre, Macsycophant, act 5.
29. Th. Camilla, 1 1/2 pages (Pt. 4). Catullus, Ep. 17, 18, 19: Hume, Vol. VIII, p. 84: Clarissa, Vol. III, p. 43. M dines.

30. F. Camilla, 1 page. Catullus, Ep. 20, 21, 22. Call on L Knapp
: R Taylor calls; adv. M
.

31. Sa. Camilla, 1 1/2 pages. Catullus, Ep. 23-27: Clarissa, p. 134. Theatre, 1/3 English Fleet; adv. Quin
.
